{{DEFAULTSORT:Empires Trilogy, The}}
'''The Empires Trilogy''' is a group of novels each written by a different author.  Publications are by [[TSR, Inc.]] from 1990-1991.  Beginning in the [[Endless Wastes]] and reaching to the eastern shores of [[Kara-Tur]] only to travel back to [[Faer√ªn]].

The books are:
# [[Horselords]] by [[David Cook]] (Apr 1990)
# [[Dragonwall (novel)|Dragonwall]] by [[Troy Denning]] (Jul 1990)
# [[Crusade]] by [[James Lowder]] (Jan 1991)
